title: Post-Sale Follow-Up & Loyalty
objective: Turn delivery into long-term loyalty by executing a consistent post-sale follow-up system that protects trust, builds confidence in ownership, and creates repeat/referral momentum—without sounding scripted or pushy.
learning_outcomes: Run a simple post-sale follow-up cadence that feels personal and helpful.
Prevent buyer’s remorse and reduce early ownership friction (features, service, questions).
Set the first service appointment and explain what to expect in a trust-first way.
Ask for referrals and reviews naturally by earning them through support.
Use CRM notes to personalize follow-up and build long-term relationship memory.
Re-engage unsold opportunities ethically when the time is right (without pressure).
